content.text: From July 1, 2025 to July 2, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 7 new pull requests opened and 10 pull requests merged. During this period, 2 new issues were created, and the repository had 10 active contributors working on the codebase.
PR #5338 by @0xtc23 titled 'feat: Add @elizaos/plugin-grok for xAI Grok models' is open.
PR #5304 titled 'Feature: Add ELIZA_UI_ENABLE environment variable to toggle Web UI availability' is merged.
PR #5311 titled 'feat: plugins upgrade with claude code' is merged.
PR #5329 titled 'chore: update agent secrets when they are empty with local vars' is merged.
PR #5326 titled 'feat: clack env prompts cli, major refactor of cli envs' is merged.
PR #5321 titled 'fix: cli create command directory display and cleanup on interruption' is merged.
PR #5342 titled 'feat(client): Restructure character form action buttons layout' is merged.
PR #5340 titled 'fix: simplify .env file creation to use template only' is merged.
PR #5339 titled 'fix: gui version resolve' is merged.
PR #5337 titled 'fix: (cli) show correct type in create command messages' is merged.
PR #5335 titled 'fix: auto-install AI model plugins on project creation' is merged.
Issue #5341 titled 'Upgrade BD tier 1-4 plugins' by @borisudovicic is OPEN with no comments since creation on July 1, 2025.
Issue #5336 titled 'Fix CLI Create Command Text for Different Types' by @linear was CLOSED on July 1, 2025, the same day it was created.
